languages.text: "Значит, чернила на бумаге тоже умеют лгать и причинять боль". {n}Кассия печально вздыхает.{/n} "Неужели все то, о чем я когда-то прочла, однажды так же разочарует меня уродливостью своей истины?"
"So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, чернила на бумаге тоже умеют лгать и причинять боль". {n}Кассия печально вздыхает.{/n} "Неужели все то, о чем я когда-то прочла, однажды так же разочарует меня уродливостью своей истины?"

traits.locale_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

"So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

languages.text: 「つまり、インクや紙も嘘はつき、苦痛を生むということなのですね」{n}カシアは悲しげにため息をつく。{/n}「あたくしがこれまで読んできたすべてについても、いつか現実の醜さと共に失望する日が来る、ということでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、インクや紙も嘘はつき、苦痛を生むということなのですね」{n}カシアは悲しげにため息をつく。{/n}「あたくしがこれまで読んできたすべてについても、いつか現実の醜さと共に失望する日が来る、ということでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Cassia soupire tristement.{/n} « Ainsi, l'encre et le papier peuvent eux aussi mentir et faire souffrir... Cela veut-il dire que tout que ce que j'ai lu dans ma vie finira un jour par me décevoir avec toute la laideur de la réalité ? »
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia soupire tristement.{/n} « Ainsi, l'encre et le papier peuvent eux aussi mentir et faire souffrir... Cela veut-il dire que tout que ce que j'ai lu dans ma vie finira un jour par me décevoir avec toute la laideur de la réalité ? »

languages.text: “原来纸和文字也会说谎，也会带来痛苦。”{n}卡西娅悲伤地叹了口气。{/n}“这是否意味着，我之前所读到的一切都有可能是假的？等我看到了丑陋的现实之后，也终将会失望？”
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: “原来纸和文字也会说谎，也会带来痛苦。”{n}卡西娅悲伤地叹了口气。{/n}“这是否意味着，我之前所读到的一切都有可能是假的？等我看到了丑陋的现实之后，也终将会失望？”

languages.text: "Dann können Tinte und Papier also auch lügen und Schmerzen bereiten." {n}Cassia seufzt traurig.{/n} "Heißt das, alles, worüber ich jemals gelesen habe, wird mich eines Tages mit der Hässlichkeit der Realität enttäuschen?"
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: "Dann können Tinte und Papier also auch lügen und Schmerzen bereiten." {n}Cassia seufzt traurig.{/n} "Heißt das, alles, worüber ich jemals gelesen habe, wird mich eines Tages mit der Hässlichkeit der Realität enttäuschen?"

languages.text: «Así que la tinta y el papel también pueden mentir y causar dolor». {n}Cassia suspira, apenada.{/n} «¿Quiere decir eso que, cuando sea testigo de la cruda realidad, me decepcionará todo lo que he leído?».
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: «Así que la tinta y el papel también pueden mentir y causar dolor». {n}Cassia suspira, apenada.{/n} «¿Quiere decir eso que, cuando sea testigo de la cruda realidad, me decepcionará todo lo que he leído?».

languages.text: "Mürekkep ve kâğıtla da yalan söylenebiliyor, can yakılabiliyormuş." {n}Cassia, hüzünle iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kitaplarda okuduğum her şey, bir gün beni gerçek hayatın çirkinliğiyle hayal kırıklığına mı uğratacak şimdi?"
languages.original_text: "So then ink and paper too can lie and cause pain." {n}Cassia sighs sadly.{/n} "Does this mean that all I have ever read about will one day disappoint me with the ugliness of reality?"

traits.locale_text: "O hâlde mürekkep ve kâğıtla da yalan söylenebiliyor, can yakılabiliyormuş." {n}Cassia, hüzünle iç çekiyor.{/n} "O zaman kitaplarda okuduğum her şey, bir gün beni gerçek hayatın çirkinliğiyle hayal kırıklığına mı uğratacak?"
